feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.66
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Enable translation for Ukrainian & Vietnamese by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4223
  • [mob][photos] Fix bug when clicking on 'collect' in shared tab to collect photos by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4229
  • [mob][photos] Fix misaligned hint text in search bar by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4232
  • [mob][photos] Fix video not changing in viewer after deletion by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/423
  • [mob] SaveOrEditPerson: Dismiss keyboard on tapping outside by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4263
  • [mob] Move manage device cache option from Advance to Free up space by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4265
  • [mob][photos] Fix UX issue with video controls when viewing a video memory by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4294
  • [mob][photos] Fix dialog that is supposed to be shown when turning off downloads coming up only when turning on downloads in manage link screen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4284
  • [mob][photos] Fix state issue when reloading avatar (#4311) by @AlexisL61 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4312
  • [mob][photos] Remove 'Descriptions' section from search tab by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4317
  • [mob][photos] Fix clipping of TextInputWidget by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4318
  • [mob][photos] Fix safe area issues by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4321
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4277
  • [mob][photos] Bump up to v0.9.66 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4357
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4354

New Contributors

  • @AlexisL61 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4312

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.65...photos-v0.9.66

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.71
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Legacy Contact by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4366
  • [mob] Copy changes by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4370
  • [mob] Copy and UX improvements by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4375
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.70 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4376
  • [mob] Fix copy by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4380

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.66...photos-v0.9.71

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.72
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix #4296 + download UI improvement + fixes by @simondubrulle in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4369
  • [mob][photos] Minor UI fix by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4396
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4406
  • [mob][photos] Log device brand and model by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4413
  • [mob][photos] Use media_kit player for videos not supported by native player by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4429

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.71...photos-v0.9.72

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.75
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob][photos] Move delete option in file selection actions to make it easily accessible (no scrolling needed) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4440
  • [mob][photos] Memories widget UI changes by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4448
  • Ml string by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4453
  • [mob] Update permission dialog by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4456
  • [mob] Fix typos by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4481
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4471
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4493
  • [mob] Remove hardcoded app urls for passkey & cast by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4494
  • [mob][photos] In-app public link fixes by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4495
  • [mob][photos] On freeing up space, retry deleting local files in batches with smaller max batch sizes if no files are deleted with bigger max batch sizes by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4505
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4538
  • [mob] Add authentication for trashed section by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4561
  • [mob][photos] Fix minor UX issue move/add to a newly created album by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4575
  • [mob][photos] Option to hide shared items from home gallery by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4582
  • [mob][photos] Bump up to v0.9.75 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4585

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.72...photos-v0.9.75

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.76
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4604
  • Update AASA to be more specific on what links to open by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4612
  • [mob][photos] Fix null check operator used on null value exception by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4617
  • [mob][server] Join albums via link by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4607
  • [mob][photos] Fix sync issue adding cluster by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4623
  • [mob][fix] Enable face to person assignment for faces with low score by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4626
  • [mob][photos] Use better batching when freeing up space in batches on iOS by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4630

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.75...photos-v0.9.76
